ComicInfo.Summary: The stranded Gods of Asgard ache for a new home. They plan to take the occupied city of Atlantis. Fearing for the lives of the sentient beings of that city, the Dragon wishes to take the Special Operations Strikeforce of Chicago to stop the Gods. However, he soon learns that the Vicious Circle owns Chicago, right down to the SOS. Despite this, he gets a squad out. The Gods murder their way into taking Atlantis, though thankfully the fatalities are few. Dragon is put into the hospital.
